entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
